title: nousb by default
body: crash on macos when no `--nousb` flag

stacktrace

@pynixwang 
1. what OS version is it, more exactly? 
2. Does it happen every time, or was it just once?
3. What exact `geth` version  was used?

```
System Version: macOS 10.15.3 (19D76)
```
always crash if no flag.

macos stacktrace no usb info. maybe somethings I run on linux and find error message has 'usb', so I disable it.
```
geth version
Geth
Version: 1.9.25-stable
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [65 64 63]
Go Version: go1.15.5
Operating System: darwin
GOPATH=/Users/pynix/go
GOROOT=go
```
Thanks for pointing this out. It should be fixed, please check again with next release and open a new issue if the problem persists.
